title: Screen freezes when my mouse is not moving
body: I have seen a lot of posts about this but no one has a solution yet. Can anyone help me with this? Because it is really annoying since I do not move my mouse much when I walk from base to land, when I died I don't move my mouse much, too.{{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Dry those tears, I'm here to help!   Well, I'd like to but I need just a bit more info.  Are you possibly on a Mac?
Yes, I am using Mac Pro Retina Late 2015

Thanks for the info!  This is a recent issue we've found specifically with the Mouse Shake feature on Mac.  The following steps should fix this up!

* Launch System Preferences and select Dock
* Navigate to the Applications folder and select Accessibility - [screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/YsdJxd9.jpg) -
* Click on Display and un-check Shake mouse pointer to locate - [screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/PUrYDpv.jpg).) -

Let me know if that helps!
I tried this solution, it did not remove the screen freeze issue for me. I am on a Mid 2015 MacBook Pro w Retina Display.

Damn, thanks for trying tough!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look into this with you.  

To help get some more context, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Got this issue since my last MacOS Sierra Update (10.12.4) 4 or 5 days ago. Tried to reinstall the game, deactivated the "shake mouse" option but the issue remains. 

Not fun as I was quite invested in the game these past few weeks but I really can't play anything else than ARAM right now :(

Is Riot working on a fix ? Thx !
Same here, I tried that and it is not working. A lot of people are having this issue, maybe it is from the client, not from our Macs? Got this issue in patch 7.6.
